name: Sharp Eyes
description:
[THIS IS AN UNFINISHED WORK IN PROGRESS]

Play as an overworked temp who has been unfairly given ALL the work to do. Spread the love by sneaking your paperwork into your coworkers' belongings. Earn bonus bucks for long-shots, but don't get caught by the boss!

Entry in the Fall 2020 Portland Indie Game Squad (PIGSquad), theme: Cutting Corners.

Future goals: Finish main mechanics, add music, sound effects/voice work, additional levels.
